name: Project Beat Bullet
description:
Lily and BeaT-02 live in a world where plants and machines live together under the Beattree in piece and combined there technologies.

While wandering around she sliped right through the roots of the Beattree and fell into in old world. Things are a bit vacant here but the remaining residents are rather hostile.

Can you fend yourself and survive?

Game Features:

  • Shoot in Rhythm to deal more damage!
  • Face against merciless machines while dodging their Bullets!

This is my fourth game done as a 26 years old game developer student from Germany. It's made with unreal, and I made everything besides sound and music by myself. (SFX sources from: https://www.weloveindies.com/)

Feedback or opinions about the game are very welcome.
